name: Seven (itch) (Str8Griz)
description:
Welcome To 7!

You are a psychic detective named Zeep that goes as deep as he needs to in order to solve any mystery. You can enter the nether and talk to spirits in order to solve crime. today you must determine which suspect committed seven murders by talking to the suspects and to the spirits. using the clues you receive you will be able to accuse one suspect. Chose right and serve justice or choose wrong and the killer will be free to strike again.

INSTRUCTIONS:

  • Move using WASD or Arrow keys
  • Talk to suspects or victims using e
  • Use the mouse to navigate conversations
  • Portals in the ground take you to the nether
  • Accuse the guilty suspect by telling them they are the murderer
  • You may want to use pen and paper to note the clues

Take your time and go deep into the story or the murderer may be free to walk among us.....
